original_text: They will look down at the earth, but they will only see trouble. Everywhere will be dark and people will have no hope. Then they will fall into complete darkness.
korean_text: 땅을 굽어보아도 환난과 흑암과 고통의 흑암뿐이리니 그들이 심한 흑암 가운데로 쫓겨 들어가리라

sentences.original_text: They will look down at the earth
but they will only see trouble
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들은 오직 환난만 보게 될 것입니다

sentences.original_text: and people will have no hope
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 사람들은 희망이 없게 될 것입니다
